name: Anne Frank House
description: We're approaching the Anne Frank House, a deeply moving place where Anne Frank wrote her famous diary. Big chance that you'll feel the history in the air as we pass by.

name: Westerkerk
description: If you look to your left, you'll see the majestic Westerkerk. This iconic church is a symbol of Amsterdam's rich history and stunning architecture.

name: The Skinny Bridge
description: We're now approaching the Skinny Bridge, an incredible piece of engineering that lights up beautifully at night. It's a favorite spot for locals and tourists alike.

name: Rijksmuseum
description: Amazing! To your right is the Rijksmuseum, home to some of the world's most famous artworks, including masterpieces by Rembrandt and Vermeer.

name: Hermitage Amsterdam
description: Incredible! The Hermitage Amsterdam is a branch museum of the Hermitage Museum of Saint Petersburg, showcasing stunning exhibitions and collections.
